doc.field: E F f0646reute d f BC-DOME-MINES-DM>-EXTEN 03-13 0048
DOME MINES DM> EXTENDING PUBLIC OFFER DEADLINE

Dome Mines Ltd said it was extending the closing date of its previously announced public offer of seven mln common shares to either March 19, pending registration of the shares under U.S. securities laws, or to March 27. Reuter
